segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and I’m furious that the woman isn’t doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying a plate like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the kids climbing and sneaking, and it’s making me even angrier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that stool, and he’s going to fall if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like she has no sense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really pay attention to what’s going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she’s so careless and unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like someone needs to step in before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just one of those moments where everything feels out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR
